Package eatree.view

Class EatreeView

java.lang.Object
processing.core.PApplet
eatree.view.EatreeView
All Implemented Interfaces:
IEatreeView, processing.core.PConstants
public class EatreeView extends processing.core.PApplet implements IEatreeView
View class for Eatree. Contains different methods to draw the GUI. Several data types are passed from the model through the controller this view for drawing.

      public void drawGame(ArrayList<Wood> woods, Player p, int numbercalls, int score)
      Draws only the gameplay state of the game.
      Specified by:
      drawGame in interface IEatreeView
      Parameters:
      woods - woods that can have branches
      p - player
      numbercalls - counter for method move(String direction) EatreeModel
      score - score achieved by the player

    • drawSeconds

      Draws the timer for the gameplay.
      Specified by:
      drawSeconds in interface IEatreeView
      Parameters:
      s - time elapsed in seconds
      seconds - total time allotted until game over in seconds

      public void drawLose(int score, int bestscore)
      Draws the game over screen.
      Specified by:
      drawLose in interface IEatreeView
      Parameters:
      score - score achieved by the player at the end of the game session
      bestscore - all time best score achieved by the player
